alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 6:39PM MST until December 27 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Stillwater, Northern Big Horn, Northern Carbon, Northeastern Yellowstone and Southwestern Yellowstone. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM MST Monday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone
